titleStmt.title: A short prayer for children and servants.
titleStmt.author: Hale, Matthew, Sir, 1609-1676. Poems upon Christmas-day.
Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626. Confession of faith.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Includes: Poems upon Christmas-day. By the late Lord Chief-Justice Hale (p. 7-10).
Copy at reel 2984:24 is improved filming; includes reprints of Poems upon Christmas-Day by Matthew Hale and A confession of faith by Francis Bacon.
Imperfect: copy at reel 2897:26 is tightly bound.
Reproductions of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
